name: Hard Jump
description:
Welcome to Hard Jump. Collect coins and buy characters that have superpowers. They will help you beat the levels more easily.

Features:

-5 characters, 4 have super power: fast, super jumper, double coins, 3 lives

-6 levels, when you finish one, the next one will be unlocked

-You can reset the game

-How to select character? Go to the shop and buy the character(if you haven't  already),  and click/touch on it.

  PC controls: left/right arrow;                                                                                                                  Jump: space                                                                                                                                                       Super jump (orange character only): X

Enjoy the game!

Play on liluo: https://liluo.io/dv08games/hard-jump
